name: battery module packaging production, Li-ion | battery module packaging, Li-ion | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/24727/documentation

;This dataset represents 1 kg of Li-ion battery module packaging, including the external enclosure, internal spacers, terminals and electronic components. Li-ion cells are not included in this dataset. This dataset is a copy of the corresponding regional dataset. Production volume was adjusted.;- Source: Dai, Q., Kelly, J. C., Gaines, L., & Wang, M. (2019). Life cycle analysis of lithium-ion batteries for automotive applications. Batteries, 5(2), 48.

The activity starts with the material entering the system.

The activity ends with the production of the Li-ion battery module packaging.
category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/272:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators/2720:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The time period is from 2018 (year of the publication of data) and 2020 (year of the dataset)
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset is considered representative of the global situation. It is based on data from the geography China, which is the leader in Li-ion battery components production.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The module is based on an aluminium casing sealed by double seaming, a process that is common in the container industry, in order to provide an additional barrier to the loss of electrolyte solvent from the cells and the entrance of water vapor. The cells are placed in the module and the terminals of adjacent cells are connected either mechanically or by laser welding. The top and bottom of the module is left open to allow air to flow between the cells to cool them.;Reference:;Nelson, P. A., Gallagher, K. G., Bloom, I. D., & Dees, D. W. (2012). Modeling the performance and cost of lithium-ion batteries for electric-drive vehicles (No. ANL-12/55). Argonne National Lab.(ANL), Argonne, IL (United States).
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The dataset is extrapolated from CN data; the uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
